title: Their Spoiled Virgin
description: A scorching hot MFM romance, that will set your summer on FIRE!  The Cress Twin’s always get what they want…  Bailey's a virgin. The one thing that twin brothers Tyler and Logan Cress try their hardest to stay away from. Yet one look at her and they both know they need to have her…  There's this deep rooted desire to possess her body, to bend her to our will.  She’s never been with one man let alone two but we aren’t about to give up… we know deep down inside she can take both of us.  Yeah, she might be too naive, and young for us but one taste will never be enough… One slip inside her warm hole and we’re both done.  She’s going to be ours no matter what she thinks…  WARNING: contains TWO very hot alpha twins that refuse to take no for an answer with a sugary sweet HEA that will leave you swooning. Let the Cress twins heat up your Summer.
author: J.L. Beck
